Trustee_18.name: Isabella Costa
Trustee_18.content: Isabella Costa's reputation has further declined due to the recent rejection of her allocation plan by investor Emma Dubois. The refusal was attributed to the perceived unfairness and lack of commitment to ethical practices in her proposed profit-sharing terms. This rejection adds to a concerning trend, as Isabella has been rejected multiple times by investors, indicating a persistent issue with her allocation strategies. To restore her credibility, Isabella needs to focus on creating more equitable proposals that align with investors' ethical standards and expectations.
